name: teamops-dashboard
description: TeamOps Dashboard - Internal Management Tool with Full Test Coverage & CI/CD

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend && npm run test:e2e
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck:frontend && npm run typecheck:backend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ../e2e && npm install
scripts.clean: npm run clean:frontend && npm run clean:backend

author: TeamOps
